ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] lost points
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh - it s not the silliness of the name.  Lord knows there s a million out there, and if Bards can t have silly names, no one should (look at the bard
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:49 AM 2/14/02 -0800, you wrote:

> >
> > >Raub Zaumbie
> >
> >Okay - you just lost points there - but we'll forgive you.
> >
> >Talies the Wanderer
> >
>You know, this was is my main, and I didn't know whether to take the name
>thing seriously or not when I started... gotta live with it now ... duly noted


Heh - it's not the silliness of the name. Lord knows there's a million out
there, and if Bards can't have silly names, no one should (look at the bard
names Verant used: Justin Rhymes, Jeckel Enheid, Tommy Tutone.... There's
even a breastplate with Tommy Tutone's song on it - 867--5309!). It's just
your choice. Sheesh - wasn't there a better musician with the first name
of "Rob"? ;)

Hey - a little off topic, but I have updated the Easterquest page a bit -
check it out!



Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
